pageTitle: Oprah's Big Give - Watch TV Shows Online at XFINITY TV
title: Season 1
textBeforeTable: Twitter Watch with XFINITY ON DEMAND™ Rec Series Tony Gonzalez Jamie Oliver, Nate Berkus, Starring Contestants vie to give money and other resources away in this series, which tests their creativity (how they can get the most bang for their bucks) and dedication (how much they're perceived as wanting to help others). One contestant is eliminated at the end of each episode. The series is based on an installment of Oprah's daytime show in which she gave audience members $1000 apiece and instructed them to use the money for charitable endeavors.
